mapper.select: select * from ( select T.*, FLOOR((ROWNUM - 1) / #{listSize} + 1) AS PAGE, count(*)over() as TOTCNT from ( select * from board order by BOARD_NO desc )T )T where T.page = #{page}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEWS, REG_DT ) VALUES ( SEQ_TB_BOARD_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, 0, #{regDt} )
